resources.string:
Juicer is an app dedicated to draining your devices battery in the most efficient way possible. Modern batteries have calibration features which tell the device how much energy is left in the battery. Overtime, if a device is kept at a high level of charge; inaccuracies can occur. This can be solved by discharging the battery to recalibrate it. You can read more about this here.

I personally recommend discharging your battery to around 40-50 percent every few of months to keep the calibration accurate. Discharging to almost empty is not good practice since it will wear out quicker.
Close Juicer? (Press the Home button to run the device in the background
There appears to be no flash on your device. Enable anyway (this may cause the app to crash)?
There appears to be no GPS on your device. Enable anyway (this may cause the app to crash)?
Having Vibrate on for a long period of time can wear out the motor (and also can be very annoying)! Are you sure you wish to enable this?
Your GPS seems to be disabled, do you want to enable it?
Your device does not appear to have Bluetooth.
Bluetooth is not enabled. Do you wish to enable it?
